import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import RoleDashboard from '../components/RoleDashboard'; import SearchBar from '../components/SearchBar'; import ProgressTracker from '../components/ProgressTracker'; import DashboardStats from '../components/DashboardStats'; const Home = () => { const stats = [ { title: 'Active Users', value: '10,000+', change: '+15%', changeType: 'positive', icon: '👥', description: 'Bangladeshi citizens' }, { title: 'Issues Resolved', value: '500+', change: '+25%', changeType: 'positive', icon: '✅', description: 'Community problems fixed' }, { title: 'Districts Covered', value: '64', change: '100%', changeType: 'positive', icon: '🗺️', description: 'All of Bangladesh' }, { title: 'Free Service', value: '100%', change: 'Always', changeType: 'positive', icon: '💚', description: 'For all citizens' } ]; const progressSteps = [ { title: 'Report Issue', description: 'Submit community problems through our easy-to-use platform' }, { title: 'Review & Assign', description: 'Our team reviews and assigns to appropriate authorities' }, { title: 'Track Progress', description: 'Monitor real-time updates on issue resolution' }, { title: 'Issue Resolved', description: 'Get notified when your community issue is fixed' } ]; const handleSearch = (query) => { console.log('Searching for:', query); }; // Check if user is logged in const isLoggedIn = localStorage.getItem('userInfo'); const user = isLoggedIn ? JSON.parse(isLoggedIn) : null; if (isLoggedIn) { return ; } return (

Why Choose CivicAid?

The most comprehensive civic engagement platform in Bangladesh

🆓

100% Free

All services completely free for Bangladeshi citizens. No hidden costs, no subscription fees.

🌍

Nationwide Coverage

Available in all 64 districts of Bangladesh. No matter where you are, we're here to help.

⚡

Fast Response

Quick issue resolution with real-time tracking and updates on progress.

🤝

Community Focus

Built specifically for Bangladeshi communities with local language support.

📱

Easy to Use

Simple, intuitive interface that works on all devices - mobile, tablet, and desktop.

🔒

Secure & Private

Your data is protected with industry-standard security measures.

Services for Everyone

Comprehensive solutions for all community needs

Report issues, track progress, and stay informed about your community.

Learn More →
